display_help: All foes that pass through this storm will be shredded with shards of falling death energy, suffering cold and negative energy damage over time. Additionally, damage is reduced on all opponents within the storm.
display_short_help: Targeted AoE, Minor DoT(Cold/Negative Energy), -DMG(Foe, All)
display_target_help: You are caught in a frigid storm and will suffer cold and negative energy damage continuously while you remain within it, in addition to reduced damage potential. Leave the storm's field to eliminate the damage and debuff.
